title: Jacobâ€™s Dream at Bethel
summary: Genesis 28 shows Jacob fleeing from Esau. On the way, he has a dream of a ladder reaching to heaven with angels ascending and descending. God reaffirms the covenant with Jacob, and Jacob names the place Bethel.

faq.question: What did Jacob see in his dream?
faq.answer: A ladder or staircase reaching to heaven, with angels going up and down on it.

faq.question: What did God promise Jacob?
faq.answer: The land, numerous descendants, and that He would be with Jacob wherever he went.
